org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades

Class BladeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blade
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockingBladeBase, IsolationBladeBase, NonBlockingBladeBase, ReactorBase, ReactorMtImpl, SwingBoundBladeBase, ThreadBoundBladeBase

    public abstract class BladeBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Blade
    Optional base class for blades.

      • _initialize

        protected void _initialize(Reactor _reactor)
        Initialize a blade. This method can only be called once without raising an illegal state exception, as the targetReactor can not be changed.
        Parameters:
        _reactor - The blade's targetReactor.
